message.content:
1. An intra-articular injection was administered.
2. There was a statistically significant decrease in visual analog scale (VAS) scores in Group M after the injection.
3. There was a statistically significant decrease in visual analog scale (VAS) scores in Group T after the injection.
4. The decrease in VAS scores was compared to Group C.
5. The decrease of VAS scores was observed at the first 2 weeks.
6. The decrease of VAS scores continued steadily up to the end of the 12th week.

messages.content:
Statement: After the intra-articular injection, there was statistically significant decrease in visual analog scale (VAS) scores in Groups M and T, when compared to Group C. The decrease of VAS scores seen at the first 2 weeks continued steadily up to the end of 12th week.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
